docTitle.titlePart:
Midrapidity Hyperon Production in pp
and pA Collisions

byline.docAuthor: G.H. Arakelyan, C. Merino, and Yu.M. Shabelski

front.note:
Presented by C. Merino at Initial Stages 2014 (IS2014)
The 2nd International Conference on the
Initial Stages in High-Energy Nuclear Collisions
Napa Valley, CA, USA, 3-7 December, 2014
front.div:
Abstract In this paper we present the description of the production of strange and
mulistrange baryons in a wide energy region, from CERN SpS up to LHC, in the
framework of the Quark-Gluon String model.

byline.affiliation: A.Alikhanyan National Scientific Laboratory (Yerevan Physics Institute),

Departamento de Física de Partículas, Facultade de Física and Instituto Galego de Física de Altas
Enerxías (IGFAE), Universidade de Santiago de Compostela,

front.address:
Santiago de Compostela 15782, Gal-
iza, Spain.

byline.affiliation: Petersburg Nuclear Physics Institute, NCR Kurchatov Institute,
